name: Private Stone
descriptions: Private Stone is a soldier serving the New California Republic at Camp Forlorn Hope in 2281.

The New California Republic's war with Caesar's Legion has taken a massive physical toll on its citizens and the emotional and mental toll on its soldiers. Stone is one of the troopers who is heavily laden with the burden of war, especially due to being located at the crucible of the worst of the fighting, in Camp Forlorn Hope.

The constant terror created by the threat of Legion raids or even a full on assault has taken a heavy toll on Private Stone, and no longer being able to handle it, he begins using the hallucinogen known as hydra, which he steals from the Camp Forlorn Hope medical center at night. It gives him a temporary relief from the fear and anxiety which is constant in a place in such a dire situation like Forlorn Hope.

The  Courier can speak with him to hear his side of the story and ask more questions about the camp and the situation with the Legion. Afterward, they can think about the sitution and decide how to handle his transgressions. If he is turned in, he can be found in the camp jail cell.
Killing him while in prison will not lose NCR reputation, but one will be attacked if choosing to do so.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Thanks for setting me straight.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about Dr. Richards' missing medical supplies?
topics.response_text: Missing medical supplies? No, uhh... I don't know anything about that.

topics.topic_text: What's your problem?
topics.response_text: My problem? My problem is we're all going to die.

topics.topic_text: How are things around camp?
topics.response_text: You kidding me, man? How are things? They're all fucked up, that's how things are!

topics.topic_text: Alright, hand it over.
topics.response_text: Here you go. Thanks, I owe you big time.

topics.topic_text: Not interested.
topics.response_text: Fine. Be like that.

topics.topic_text: Dilated eyes, increased heart rate... I think you took the drugs.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] What?! Oh shit... how the fuck?! Oh man, I'm in some deep shit now.

topics.topic_text: You look a little sick. Maybe you should see Dr. Richards.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] No, no that's not necessary. I'm fine. Just a little stressed out, that's all.

topics.topic_text: Then why did I find this empty syringe in your pocket?
topics.response_text: Holy shit! How the hell did you find that?

topics.topic_text: Private Sexton mentioned you wander around the camp at night.
topics.response_text: I do what now? Uhh... I mean, yeah, I sometimes need to... stretch my legs. Helps me... uh... think.

topics.topic_text: I know what's really going on. You can trust me.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well... sometimes I sneak into the medical tent at night and "borrow" some of the medical supplies.

topics.topic_text: I saw you stealing the supplies.
topics.response_text: Uh... look, it's not what you think. I can explain everything, if you'll just hear me out.

topics.topic_text: Okay. Thanks anyway.
topics.response_text: Uh... yeah, sure, no problem.

topics.topic_text: This better be good.
topics.response_text: Have you looked around? Have you seen what's going on here? What we're going through?

topics.topic_text: I don't care about your explanations.
topics.response_text: Hey look, I just wanted to forget about all this stuff happening around here for a little while, that's all!

topics.topic_text: Doing drugs isn't going to change anything.
topics.response_text: But it sure as hell is going to make me feel better for a little while, and that's all I wanted.

topics.topic_text: What about the injured men that need this medicine?
topics.response_text: I... uh... I never... I never thought about that.

topics.topic_text: Hum... I think I understand.
topics.response_text: Yeah, see... I just needed to escape for a little while. To not think about all this stuff going on here.

topics.topic_text: That's a poor excuse.
topics.response_text: I knew you wouldn't understand! You haven't been here! You haven't been through all the horrors that we go through every day!

topics.topic_text: I'm going to turn you in.
topics.response_text: Haven't you heard anything I've said?! Don't you understand?!

topics.topic_text: I want you to turn yourself in.
topics.response_text: What? You want me to turn myself in?

topics.topic_text: I won't turn you in... if you make it worth my while.
topics.response_text: Alright. Here, I'll give you some of what I stole, just don't mention this to anyone.

topics.topic_text: If you promise to stop, I won't turn you in.
topics.response_text: What? Hey sure! You got a deal. Thanks, I owe you big time.

topics.topic_text: Because it's the right thing to do.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] No. That's not going to happen.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, right. Why don't you tell me what's really going on?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Nothing's going on, so just mind your own business.

topics.topic_text: I sometimes do the same thing.
topics.response_text: Yeah, nothing strange about a late night stroll. Everybody does it.

topics.topic_text: For some reason I don't believe you.
topics.response_text: I don't care what you believe. Now unless there's something else, why don't you just buzz off.

topics.topic_text: It's better if you turn yourself in rather than me turning you in.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I... I guess you're right. I'll do the right thing and turn myself in.

topics.topic_text: I could ask you the same thing.
topics.response_text: {Nervous}Uh... I was just... uh... getting some fresh air and stretching my legs. It's getting pretty late though, I should get going. Goodnight.

topics.topic_text: I'm just enjoying a late night stroll.
topics.response_text: Yeah, yeah... me too. It's getting a bit late though, I should get going. Goodnight.

topics.topic_text: Sneaking around at night is a little suspicious.
topics.response_text: {Nervous}I'm not sneaking! I'm uh... just stretching my legs. I should be getting back though, it's late. Goodnight.
